info.title: odmObject binary switch

switch.binary.desc:
This odmObject describes a binary switch (on/off).
The Property "value" is a boolean.
A value of 'true' means that the switch is on.
A value of 'false' means that the switch is off.
switch.binary.name: binary switch, e.g. on/off
